snippet: “Let’s Go Eat the Factory” by Guided by Voices is the result of a more collaborative effort that started when Robert Pollard reconstituted the band in 2010.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Guided by Voices album Let's Go Eat the Factory; Ben Ratliff reviews Kevin Hufnagel album Transparencies; Nate Chinen reviews Jimmy Owens album The Monk Project.

byline.original: By JON PARELES, BEN RATLIFF and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: “Let’s Go Eat the Factory” by Guided by Voices is the result of a more collaborative effort that started when Robert Pollard reconstituted the band in 2010.

headline.seo: New Music by Kevin Hufnagel, Jimmy Owens and Guided by Voices
headline.main: New Albums by Kevin Hufnagel, Jimmy Owens and Guided by Voices
